Name: The Cave Rock Club

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Awesome place! Ended up almost snapping my foot in half in 2018 after being sent full speed into a chair while moshing along to a black metal band from Malaysia. Good times.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Best metal club in the Netherlands. Very cool owner and staff. Great beers and music. Small but off the path of tourist spots. I highly recommend a visit !

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: The heart of metal if Amsterdam beats in the Cave. Very friendly staff and cool atmosphere. Great music taste and unexpected live performances. Don't miss if you're a metalhead!

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Felt very judged as soon as we walked in just because we didn't exactly "look the part". Dressed a little nicer as we went for dinner before going there and just felt very unwelcome as soon as we stepped foot in that place and got way over ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text:
Concept is awesome but in my
Multiple visits lacks execution. Rarely live music and tiny area if there ever was. Staff are cool and prices are average. Highlight is decor so thats an issue.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Good metal bar with friendly staff and often live music at the weekend.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Love the music and the staff!

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text:
Sex and drugs and rock and roll
Is all my brain and body need
Sex and drugs and rock and roll

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Fantastic bar! Great staff, great music, great drinks, also seen some good live bands over the years. A must, if you love your music heavy and loud!

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Very nice metal bar. Great music, very friendly staff and a superb place to meet other metalheads around a good beer.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: One of the few places in Amsterdam that still cares about Rock music. Nice staff, loud music (as it should be), good prices. Nothing fancy, just good fun, good music and a nice crowd. If you're looking for something NOT ELECTRONIC in Amsterdam that's the place.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Original  Amsterdam rock goth punk bar with bands from time to time

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: I've been to Metal/Rock bars in Vienna, Krakow  Paris, New York, Prague, Rio de Janeiro, etc... This is THE TOP BEST one!!! Highly recommended!! ü§òüèøü§òüèøü§òüèø

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: A great place for hard rock lovers! Even when there is no live music, the atmosphere is awesome!

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: I have not been there yet. I will be going in a few days for the first time. However, in the meantime, it would be nice if they fixed their website and Facebook pages. They have been down for weeks. No one noticed? Really?

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Best non-metal-racist bar evar. Every other bar hated us! They loved us. Major love for the Barkeeper and the Security.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Friendly metal club! Great staff, great patrons, great dive bar ambiance. Sometimes hosts live bands.

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: Really nice place to hear some good metal, a good welcoming team, the place is really well made (designed?).

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: If you like metal ,this is the place to go !nice atmosphere and great service !

Name: The Cave Rock Club
Review Text: A dive bar with no equal in Amsterdam. Hard rock and metal all the time with frequent underground bands performing.
